tasks.label: git-commit-and-push
tasks.command: zsh -lc 'git add -A && git commit -m "chore: restore classic single-player, remove server usage paths" || echo "no commit"; echo "---"; git status -sb; echo "---"; git remote -v; echo "---"; CURRENT_BRANCH=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD); echo "branch=$CURRENT_BRANCH"; git push --set-upstream origin "$CURRENT_BRANCH"'
